data.event: Formerly known as the township of Michipicoten, after a nearby river of that name, the township was officially renamed in 2007 for its largest and best-known community of Wawa.

event.title: began as early as the late 1660s, it was not until 1896

data.event: Although mining attempts began as early as the late 1660s, it was not until 1896 that gold was discovered along nearby Wawa Lake.
